lead_paragraph: Russia’s Olga Kaniskina set the world record in the women’s 20-kilometer walk with a time of 1:25:11 at the national championships in the southern Russian city of Adler. Kaniskina, 23, who won the 20-kilometer gold at last year’s world championships in Japan, bettered the time of 1:25:41 set by her compatriot Olimpiada Ivanova on Aug. 7, 2005, at the world championships in Helsinki, Finland.
